programme.title: The Children of Dushanbe
programme.short_synopsis: Angus Crawford reports on the efforts to help vulnerable girls in Tajikistan.
programme.medium_synopsis: Angus Crawford reports on efforts to rescue vulnerable girls in Tajikistan who were locked up rather than helped.
programme.long_synopsis: Angus Crawford reports on efforts to rescue vulnerable girls in Tajikistan who were locked up rather than helped. He hears how girls who had been raped were detained for being 'degenerate'. He also sees how a British NGO is working with the Tajik authorities to help these teenagers find freedom and safety.
